comment: Scheduling - he definately knows his material and will present real-world examples and situations.  Makes you think deep - not an easy class, but I took more away from this class than most any other CM class.

Construction Project Mgmt - He was great. The in class projects were very good and made you think up solutions for real world problems. I would definitely recommend him. Average amount of work. Not easy but not hard. Come to class and you should do fine.
